name: Noted451 - Rosett SFXs
description:
• Various sfxs recorded and created. 
  • Soundscapes/Sound notes:
    • Vines, earthy, dirty. Punchy. Uproot.
    • Fantasy cyber overall [More magic than manitech]: Bells and chimes with synth.  Reverb, damp. Ethereal, but underlying warmth. Long release.
    • Darker fantasy-cyber [Manitech-related?]: Overdrive and bit-decay. Deep drone pad versus sporadic higher synth voice. Strain on frequency/resonance filter. Vague tonal identity.
